original_text: But if they had stood in my counsel, and had caused my people to hear my words, then they should have turned them from their evil way, and from the evil of their doings.
korean_text: 그들이 만일 나의 회의에 참여하였더라면 내 백성에게 내 말을 들려서 그들을 악한 길과 악한 행위에서 돌이키게 하였으리라

sentences.original_text: But if they had stood in my counsel
and had caused my people to hear my words
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 백성이 나의 말을 듣게 하였더라면

sentences.original_text: then they should have turned them from their evil way
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 악한 길에서 돌이켰을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and from the evil of their doings
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 행실의 악에서도 돌이켰을 것입니다
